flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Robert Sabuda is the author of many NYTimes Bestselling pop-up books. His website hosts a "Make Your Own Pop-ups" section with templates and directions for you to make pop-ups on your own!
guide.introduction_rendered: Robert Sabuda is the author of many NYTimes Bestselling pop-up books. His website hosts a "Make Your Own Pop-ups" section with templates and directions for you to make pop-ups on your own!
guide.summary: Robert Sabuda's studio designed this pop-up for a workshop at the World Maker Faire 2010 in New York City. Now you can make one too!
guide.title: Make a Pop-Up Robot!
